Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery beer-vessel (?), the fabric is grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is elaborated with polychrome-painted decoration, lotus-flower-petal motifs, surmounted by a band, in brown, blue and red on a light-brown background, with one line of black-painted hieratic text above.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393408) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393408)
